name: performant-array-to-tree
description: Converts an array of items with ids and parent ids to a nested tree in a performant `O(n)` way. Runs in browsers and node.
author: Philip Stanislaus <stanislaus.philip@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc && npm run uglify
scripts.test-and-send-cov-to-coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- build/**/*.spec.js -R spec --bail && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-cov && npm run test-remap
